posts.post_content: Selling---Old Judge Slip Advertisement (not sure what to call this) $140--really neat though---check scans----thanks,  Don

Don-It is called a metamorphic. We discusses these and the many varieties of this advertising card in the Old Judge Book.

Jay

[quote name="oldjudge" post=1947875]Don-It is called a metamorphic. We discusses these and the many varieties of this advertising card in the Old Judge Book.

Jay[/QUOTE]

Jay---thanks,  I wanted to email you since I knew you would certainly know this piece, but didn't know your email---thanks, for the update.
